body:
What is the maximum size of one BlobProperty in appengine? 
I'm not talking about of the Blobstore API, i'm referring to the property class [BlobProperty](http://code.google.com/appengine/docs/python/datastore/typesandpropertyclasses.html#BlobProperty)

Please add a link who support your answers
title: max size in BlobProperty (appengine)
